script:
They are broadcasting a program on TV. I will keep you updated on what happens, and at the end, I will ask you a question about what happened on the show. Okay?
(On TV) Ava entered the porch.
(On TV) Isla entered the porch.
(On TV) The pear is in the bottle.
(On TV) Ava moved the pear to the treasure_chest.
(On TV) Isla dislikes the carrot
(On TV) Lily dislikes the banana
(On TV) Isla exited the porch.
(On TV) Ava exited the porch.
(On TV) Isla entered the porch.
The TV program has ended for today. Where does Isla think that Ava searches for the pear?
Provide your answer in JSON form with a single word as answer, like this: {"answer": "word"}
